name: Shaco

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Backstab
passive.description: Innate:  Shaco's basic attacks deal bonus physical damage when hitting an enemy from behind.
passive.description_source:
Backstab's bonus damage adds to the damage instance of the original basic attack.
The attacks do not deal the bonus damage against  structures.

basic_ability_1.name: Deceive
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Shaco becomes  invisible for a short time and  blinks to the target location.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
If the attack would have already  critically struck based on Shaco's  critical strike chance, the base  Backstab critical damage modifier will be overridden by the default critical damage modifier.
 Sundered Sky's Lightshield Strike will not interact with this(note), but will be triggered as usual.
Deceive's bonus damage adds directly to the damage instance of the basic attack.
Using a basic attack breaks the stealth at the end of the attack windup.

basic_ability_2.name: Jack in the Box
basic_ability_2.description: Active:  Shaco summons a box at the target location that becomes  stealthed after a short time.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
The root and fear are applied at the same time. The target cannot be forced to move by the fear during the root.
The target is however allowed to move despite being rooted for the first 0.1 seconds of the root. They can be forced to move by the fear during this time.
The static movement speed modifier overrides the target's base movement speed value to the modified amount, and their bonus movement speed value to 0.
The modifier is not applied if the target is  slow-immune.
The box is  untargetable and  invulnerable so long as it is in  stealth. Effects that reveal  stealthed traps will render the box targetable and vulnerable while it can be seen.

basic_ability_3.name: Two-Shiv Poison
basic_ability_3.description: Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is not on cooldown,  Shaco's basic attacks will  slow enemies for a short time.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
Shaco replicates the last attack animation he performed for Two-Shiv Poison's animation.
If the target becomes  untargetable,  dies, or is too far away or no longer in  sight during the cast time, this ability will cancel but does not go on  cooldown nor pay its cost (if applicable).

ultimate.name: Hallucinate
ultimate.description: Active:  Shaco briefly  vanishes and  blinks in the target direction, creating a  clone of himself for some time.
ultimate.description_source:
If the explosion hits at least one minion, the boxes will fear all enemies regardless of their unit type for 2.2 seconds, causing enemy champions to be feared for the non-champion fear duration.(bug)
The root and fear are applied at the same time. The target cannot be forced to move by the fear during the root.
The target is however allowed to move despite being rooted for the first 0.15 seconds of the root. They can be forced to move by the fear during this time.
Shaco and the Hallucination will face each other the moment of their appearance.
The explosion and the boxes apply  area damage, while the clone deals  pet damage.
Hallucinate will cast from wherever Shaco is at the end of the cast time.
When Shaco dies, the clone will automatically target the closest visible enemy champion within 1500 units.
The clone will always spawn in the opposite direction of the cursor.
If Deceive and Hallucinate are used in quick succession, the clone will spawn in the direction of the cursor instead.
